content: Across our customers spending $100,000 or more, the dollar-based-net retention rate is well over 145%, illustrating that we are not only winning large deals but these large deals have the highest expansion rate among our customer cohorts. This number jumps to over 60% for customers spending more than $100,000, and we see an even higher proportion of this cross-functional collaboration in the features weâve built as weâve moved up market, including Goals & Portfolios. We now have 462 customers spending over $100,000 on an annualized basis, and these larger deals represent our fastest growing customer cohort, up 105% year-over-year. So, as we enter -- something that weâre really excited about is as we enter the season where a lot of our customers and prospective customers are doing strategic planning, theyâre doing Goals planning, thatâs also driving much more interest in Asana.
